reconfigure_confirm.description: Reconfigure integration. This will allow you to change application credentials and selected accounts. Continue to reconfigure.

pick_implementation_existing.description: You have {count} sets of credentials configured. Choose which one to use. To add more credentials, go to Settings → Application Credentials and add new Sparebank1 credentials there first.
